baseline_texts: This frame shows a close-up of an outstretched hand pointing towards a pile of clothes or fabric on a bed or soft surface. The items include a yellow piece of clothing or fabric, a red one, and what appears to be a blue or dark-colored sock or garment. The background includes patterned bedding with various colors and designs. The image seems to be slightly out of focus, especially around the hand and foreground.

The frame shows a close-up view of a bed or couch with a mattress and some cushions or blankets on it. A person wearing a red shirt and blue jeans is lying or crouching on the surface, with a yellow object near their head. A hand, presumably of the person taking the photo or video, is reaching out toward the person in red. The image is slightly blurry, indicating motion.

This frame shows a yellow bird, possibly a cockatiel, perched on or near a pile of blankets or bedding. The blankets are of various colors, including red, beige, and a patterned one with blue and pink hues. The bird is partially covered by or resting on the beige blanket. In the lower left of the frame, a human hand is reaching out toward the bird or the blankets. The setting appears to be a cozy indoor space, possibly a bed or a couch with bedding.

The image shows a bed covered with various blankets and sheets. A red blanket is prominently draped over part of the bed. Near the top right, there is a yellow Pikachu plush toy lying on the bed. The bed itself appears to have a mattress without a fitted sheet, and the overall scene looks cozy but somewhat cluttered with the blankets.

The image shows a bed or a mattress with various blankets and a pillow. A red blanket partially covers someone lying down, with their face mostly hidden. There is a yellow Pikachu plush toy placed near the person's shoulder. The bedding consists of multiple layers, including a beige pillow and blankets with different colors and patterns. The setting appears to be cozy and informal.

This frame shows a bed or sleeping area with layered blankets and pillows. There is a large beige pillow, a red blanket, and a colorful patterned blanket. A small, yellow Pikachu plush toy is resting on top of the bedding near the center-right of the image. The setting appears cozy and casual.

This frame shows a bed with several blankets and pillows arranged on it. There is a red pillow on the bed, partially covering a yellow Pikachu plush toy. The bed has a light-colored sheet or mattress cover and multiple colorful blankets, including one with a mix of blue and red tones. The setting appears to be a casual, cozy bedroom environment.

The image shows a bed with multiple layers of blankets and sheets in various colors and patterns. On the bed is a small yellow plush toy, which resembles Pikachu from Pok√©mon. The plush toy is partially covered by a dark blue blanket and is resting on a beige bed sheet. There is also a maroon or dark red fabric visible on the bed. The overall scene looks cozy and somewhat cluttered.
diff_texts: Initial frame. No previous frame to compare.
The yellow object, which is being held, moved slightly downward and became blurred, indicating motion away from the camera. The hand also shifted position slightly downward and forward.

The yellow object, which appears to be a bird, moved from a blurred position on the red fabric to a clearer position above the person's legs. The hand in the foreground moved closer to the yellow bird.
The Pikachu plush has shifted slightly to the right and is now more upright in the current frame compared to the previous one.
There is no visible change in the main object or its motion between the two frames.
The person under the red blanket shifted their hand slightly, moving it a bit more out from under the blanket.
The main object, a small yellow plush toy, has shifted slightly to the right in the current frame compared to the previous one.
The yellow Pikachu plush on the bed has slightly shifted its position, now leaning more towards the right compared to the previous frame.
